BkpwfDI_X.description: Just use `uart` constructor nodes directly, they now have `INIT` and `DONE` pins to begin communication

@/begin.description: Begins communication with UART and sets defined baud rate.

HyBX8HqWX.description: A new baud rate to set
HyBX8HqWX.label: BAUD

@/change-baud-rate.description: Changes baud rate of passed UART object. If UART already has started communication it will end it up and begin again with new baud rate.

SJlSN2v-m.description: Hack to make watch nodes works on Leonardo

S1XgMnT6DWm.description: Hack to make watch nodes works on Leonardo

SkG9l2DbQ.description: Hack to make watch nodes works on Leonardo

HJnKfztbm.description: Pulses when there is nothing to read from UART
HJnKfztbm.label: N

S1dYzzYWm.description: Pulses when UART have available bytes
S1dYzzYWm.label: Y

rkytzGK-7.description: Check does UART have an available bytes to read
rkytzGK-7.label: UPD

@/is-available.description: Checks does UART have an available bytes to read

H1VpIKnLb7.description: Triggers write of a string into UART
H1VpIKnLb7.label: SEND

rkl6IK3L-7.description: Pulses when all String has been written
rkl6IK3L-7.label: DONE

ryGwYhIZm.description:
String to be sent into UART.
Could contain "\r\n" symbols to sent few lines.
ryGwYhIZm.label: DATA

@/print.description:
Writes a string bytes per byte into UART.

Possible errors:
 No bytes written. Probably due to buffer overflow

H1gsyZ3PZm.description: Pulses when all outgoing data sent
H1gsyZ3PZm.label: DONE

ryGs1Z2vW7.description: Flush outgoing buffer when all data transmitted
ryGs1Z2vW7.label: UPD

@/flush.description: Waits for the transmission of outgoing serial data to complete and then clears UART buffer.

Sy0-yt8ZQ.description: Speed of data transmission in bits per second (baud rate).
Sy0-yt8ZQ.label: BAUD

Syz-kKUWX.description: Digital port on the device for receiving data
Syz-kKUWX.label: RX

r1mZktLZm.description: Digital port on the device for transmiting data
r1mZktLZm.label: TX

@/soft-uart.description: Constructor of SoftwareUart, provides serial communication on any digital pins.

H1DwMu5bX.description: Speed of data transmission in bits per second (baud rate).
H1DwMu5bX.label: BAUD

@/uart.description: Constructor of HardwareUart, provides serial communication on default hardware serial ports.

r1bXu3LWm.description: Trigger reading of one byte from UART
r1bXu3LWm.label: READ

@/read-byte.description:
Reads one byte from UART.

Possible errors:
 Can't read byte

rJ2IpKQMX.description: Pulses when UART has no more available bytes to read
rJ2IpKQMX.label: END

rkVBb1uZ7.description: The last received byte from the UART

@/read-bytes.description:
Reads all available bytes from UART one by one.

Possible errors:
 Can't read byte

BytfJKIWX.description: Speed of data transmission in bits per second (baud rate).
BytfJKIWX.label: BAUD

@/uart-0.description: Constructor of HardwareUart, provides serial communication through Serial.

BytfJKIWX.description: Speed of data transmission in bits per second (baud rate).
BytfJKIWX.label: BAUD

@/uart-3.description: Constructor of HardwareUart, provides serial communication through Serial3.

BytfJKIWX.description: Speed of data transmission in bits per second (baud rate).
BytfJKIWX.label: BAUD

@/uart-2.description: Constructor of HardwareUart, provides serial communication through Serial2.

HJxHrv3I-m.description: Pulses when byte was successfully written
HJxHrv3I-m.label: DONE

@/write-byte.description:
Writes a single byte in the UART.

Possible errors:
 No bytes written. Probably due to buffer overflow

BytfJKIWX.description: Speed of data transmission in bits per second (baud rate).
BytfJKIWX.label: BAUD

@/uart-usb.description: Constructor of HardwareUart or UsbUart, that provides serial communication through SerialUSB.

BytfJKIWX.description: Speed of data transmission in bits per second (baud rate).
BytfJKIWX.label: BAUD

@/uart-1.description: Constructor of HardwareUart, provides serial communication through Serial1.

description: Provides constructors and Nodes to interact with UARTs (Software, Hardware, USB) in XOD.
name: uart
